column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Service was subpar and inadequate
column2: and mainly the reason I will not return. The food was great! Except it came to the table a bit cool. Waited 2+ hours
column3: which wouldn't have been a problem if the hostesses were friendly. However
column4: they seemed irritated with our presence. I honestly felt like my friends and I were not paid full attention to because of our age. We are not of drinking age
column5: and I think we were discriminated against because of this. Our waiter
column8: nor did he provide adequate information on general tapas knowledge
column9: despite us telling him it was our first tapas experience. When we asked him to split the bill
column10: he basically told us that we could figure it out ourselves and write down on the receipt what he should charge each of our cards. Was disappointed because it could have been such a nice experience.
